title: Witch font is used in the logo for "Violet Oons Kitchen"?
content:
I am wondering if there has been used a spesific font in the "Violet Oons Kitchen" logo - or if its all handmade?  
 [http://www.greatnewplaces.com/images/Culinary/img5481\_02092012074937.jpeg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021134318/http:/www.greatnewplaces.com/images/Culinary/img5481_02092012074937.jpeg "http://www.greatnewplaces.com/images/Culinary/img5481\_02092012074937.jpeg")

Once again - thank you for your help! :)
author: marenhei

comments.content: Linotype Centennial seems to work for the lc characters. Not sure about the US but i swear someone just recently had the same O in another id thread.
